name: Crawler Glia
desc:
FLIP: You can Special Summon 1 "Crawler" monster from your hand or GY in Attack Position or face-down Defense Position, except "Crawler Glia" and "Acid Crawler".
If this face-up card in its owner's control leaves the field because of an opponent's card effect: You can Special Summon 2 "Crawler" monsters with different names from your Deck in face-down Defense Position, except "Crawler Glia" and "Acid Crawler". You can only use each effect of "Crawler Glia" once per turn.
